text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Storm

Item specifications:
A Bowen Designs Sculpture!
Detailed sculpture of Storm from the X-Men franchise in white constume
Statue measures 12" Tall
Sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen
text.Response A: With her ability to control the weather, Ororo Munroe - code-named Storm - has been one of the X-Men's most powerful members since her debut in Giant-Size X-Men #1. This dynamic statue, sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen, features Storm in her white costume that she wore during the 1990's. Standing 12" tall, the Storm: White Costume statue shows Ororo leaping from a rocky base with the winds at her back. Painted and ready to display.
text.Response B: Bowen Designs is thrilled to introduce Storm, the newest addition to the X-Men family!  Storm is a mutant with the ability to control the weather and is a founding member of the X-Men.  Storm is one of the most powerful mutants on the planet and is a key member of the X-Men.  Bowen Designs has masterfully sculpted Storm in her iconic white costume and this statue is a must have for any X-Men fan!  Storm stands 12 inches tall and is a limited edition.  Don't miss out on this amazing statue!

368.displayed_text:
Prompt

Using the item specifications and item name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item name:
Storm

Item specifications:
A Bowen Designs Sculpture!
Detailed sculpture of Storm from the X-Men franchise in white constume
Statue measures 12" Tall
Sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen

Response A

With her ability to control the weather, Ororo Munroe - code-named Storm - has been one of the X-Men's most powerful members since her debut in Giant-Size X-Men #1. This dynamic statue, sculpted by Mark Newman, Gabe Perna, and Randy Bowen, features Storm in her white costume that she wore during the 1990's. Standing 12" tall, the Storm: White Costume statue shows Ororo leaping from a rocky base with the winds at her back. Painted and ready to display.

Response B

Bowen Designs is thrilled to introduce Storm, the newest addition to the X-Men family! Storm is a mutant with the ability to control the weather and is a founding member of the X-Men. Storm is one of the most powerful mutants on the planet and is a key member of the X-Men. Bowen Designs has masterfully sculpted Storm in her iconic white costume and this statue is a must have for any X-Men fan! Storm stands 12 inches tall and is a limited edition. Don't miss out on this amazing statue!
